p: The results of analysis of variance showed that in sensory evaluation of samples (aroma), score less than 4 for control sample was observed on day 3. For the QSSM sample, score less than 4 was obtained on day 6, and for QSSM + LO samples containing 0.5%, 1%, 1.5%, and 2% essential oil up to day 9, a score above 4 was obtained (Figure 5b). Various studies have shown that Pseudomonas spp. causes spoilage in unpackaged beef samples (Alizadeh Behbahani et al., 2017; Dainty et al., 1989).
